  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(View view)
      Parameters:
      view - GUI object needs to be passed to controller as both view and controller have references to each-other.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add()
      function that adds student to list in memory. Currently, does not save automatically to allow user to backtrack changes they made.

    • remove

      public void remove()
      function that removes student from memory. Currently, it doesn't save to database and waits for user to save their changes. This was a deliberate choice.

    • load

      public void load(String table)
      Parameters:
      table - table to connect to and load all data from it

    • exit

      public void exit()
      exits program

    • loadChoice

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> loadChoice(String table)
      Returns:
      student name and ID for dropDown menus.

    • labelLoad

      public void labelLoad(boolean choice)
      Parameters:
